wps:Process.ows:Title: Computes the geometry area (in a cartesian plane, using the same unit of measure as the geometry coordinates, don't use with geometries expressed in geographic coordinates)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes the geometry area (in a cartesian plane, using the same unit of measure as the geometry coordinates, don't use with geometries expressed in geographic coordinates)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a geometry boundary, or an empty geometry if there is no boundary
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a geometry boundary, or an empty geometry if there is no boundary

wps:Process.ows:Title: Buffers a geometry using a certain distance
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Buffers a geometry using a certain distance

wps:Process.ows:Title: Extracts a geometry centroid
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Extracts a geometry centroid

wps:Process.ows:Title: Checks if a contains b
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Checks if a contains b

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the convex hull of the specified geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the convex hull of the specified geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the two geometries cross each other
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the two geometries cross each other

wps:Process.ows:Title: Densifies the geometry using the specified distance
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Densifies the geometry using the specified distance

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the difference between a and b (all the points that are in a but not in b)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the difference between a and b (all the points that are in a but not in b)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns 0 for points, 1 for lines, 2 for polygons
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns 0 for points, 1 for lines, 2 for polygons

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the two geometries have no points in common
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the two geometries have no points in common

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the minimum distance between a and b
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the minimum distance between a and b

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the end point of the line
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the end point of the line

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the geometry envelope either as a Polygon, or a Point if the input is a Point
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the geometry envelope either as a Polygon, or a Point if the input is a Point

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the two geometries are exactly the same
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the two geometries are exactly the same

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the two geometries are exactly the same, minus small differences in coordinate values
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the two geometries are exactly the same, minus small differences in coordinate values

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the exterior ring of the polygon
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the exterior ring of the polygon

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the type of the geometry (POINT,LINE,POLYGON,MULTIPOINT,MULTILINE,MULTIPOLYGON,GEOMETRY COLLECTION)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the type of the geometry (POINT,LINE,POLYGON,MULTIPOINT,MULTILINE,MULTIPOLYGON,GEOMETRY COLLECTION)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the n-th geomery in the collection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the n-th geomery in the collection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the X ordinate of the point
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the X ordinate of the point

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the Y ordinate of the point
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the Y ordinate of the point

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a point that lies inside the geometry, or at most is located on its boundary
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a point that lies inside the geometry, or at most is located on its boundary

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the n-th interior ring in the polygon
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the n-th interior ring in the polygon

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the intersectoin between a and b (eventually an empty collection if there is no intersection)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the intersectoin between a and b (eventually an empty collection if there is no intersection)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the two geometries intersect, false otherwise
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the two geometries intersect, false otherwise

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the line is closed
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the line is closed

wps:Process.ows:Title: Checks if the provided geometry is empty
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Checks if the provided geometry is empty

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the line is a ring
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the line is a ring

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the geometry is simple
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the geometry is simple

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the geometry is topologically valid, false otherwise
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the geometry is topologically valid, false otherwise

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the distance between the two geomeries is less than the specified value
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the distance between the two geomeries is less than the specified value

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the geometry perimeters, computed using cartesian geometry expressions in the same unit of measure as the geometry (will not return a valid perimeter for geometries expressed geographic coordinates
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the geometry perimeters, computed using cartesian geometry expressions in the same unit of measure as the geometry (will not return a valid perimeter for geometries expressed geographic coordinates

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the number of elements in the geometry collection, or one if it's not a collection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the number of elements in the geometry collection, or one if it's not a collection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the number of interior rings in the polygon
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the number of interior rings in the polygon

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the number of points in the geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the number of points in the geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if a overlaps with b
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if a overlaps with b

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the n-th point in the line
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the n-th point in the line

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the DE-9IM intersection matrix of the two geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the DE-9IM intersection matrix of the two geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if a and b DE-9IM intersection matrix matches the provided pattern
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if a and b DE-9IM intersection matrix matches the provided pattern

wps:Process.ows:Title: Simplifies the geometry using the specified distance using the Douglas-Peuker algorithm
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Simplifies the geometry using the specified distance using the Douglas-Peuker algorithm

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the start point of the line
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the start point of the line

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a geometry made of points that are in a or b, but not in both
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a geometry made of points that are in a or b, but not in both

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the two geometries touch each other
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the two geometries touch each other

wps:Process.ows:Title: Performs the geometric union of two or more geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Performs the geometric union of two or more geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if a is within b
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if a is within b

wps:Process.ows:Title: Sum a coverage A with a coverage B. The two coverages need to have the same envelope and the same resolution. The operation will do pixel by pixel addition: outputCoveragePixel[i][j] = sourceCoverageAPixel[i][j] + sourceCoverageBPixel[i][j]
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Sum a coverage A with a coverage B. The two coverages need to have the same envelope and the same resolution. The operation will do pixel by pixel addition: outputCoveragePixel[i][j] = sourceCoverageAPixel[i][j] + sourceCoverageBPixel[i][j]

wps:Process.ows:Title: Computes various attribute statistics over vector data sets
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes various attribute statistics over vector data sets

wps:Process.ows:Title: Computes the overlall bounds of the input features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes the overlall bounds of the input features

wps:Process.ows:Title: Collects all the default geometries in the feature collection and returns them as a single geometry collection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Collects all the default geometries in the feature collection and returns them as a single geometry collection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Perform the contouring on a provided raster
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Perform the contouring on a provided raster

wps:Process.ows:Title: Counts the number of features in the specified collection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Counts the number of features in the specified collection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Collects all the default geometries in the feature collection and returns them as a single geometry collection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Collects all the default geometries in the feature collection and returns them as a single geometry collection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Imports the provided feature collection into the catalog
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Imports the provided feature collection into the catalog

wps:Process.ows:Title: Multiply a coverage A by a coverage B. The two coverages need to have the same envelope and the same resolution. The operation will do pixel by pixel multiplication: outputCoveragePixel[i][j] = sourceCoverageAPixel[i][j] * sourceCoverageBPixel[i][j]
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Multiply a coverage A by a coverage B. The two coverages need to have the same envelope and the same resolution. The operation will do pixel by pixel multiplication: outputCoveragePixel[i][j] = sourceCoverageAPixel[i][j] * sourceCoverageBPixel[i][j]

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get nearest feature
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Get nearest feature

wps:Process.ows:Title: Generates a set of polygons, each representing the set of points within a given distance from the central pointThe data layer must be a point layer, the reference layer must be a polygonal one
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Generates a set of polygons, each representing the set of points within a given distance from the central pointThe data layer must be a point layer, the reference layer must be a polygonal one

wps:Process.ows:Title: Perform the polygon extraction on a provided raster
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Perform the polygon extraction on a provided raster

wps:Process.ows:Title: Applies a filter and an attribute selection to the incoming feature collection. The process can be also used as a pure format converter when no filtering or attribute selection is performed
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Applies a filter and an attribute selection to the incoming feature collection. The process can be also used as a pure format converter when no filtering or attribute selection is performed

wps:Process.ows:Title: Reclassifies a continous coverage into a set of ranges identified by a number
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Reclassifies a continous coverage into a set of ranges identified by a number

wps:Process.ows:Title: Convert a Raster into a collections of points
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Convert a Raster into a collections of points

wps:Process.ows:Title: Provides statistics for the distribution of a certain quantity in a set of reference areas. The data layer is a raster layer, the reference layer must be a polygonal one
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Provides statistics for the distribution of a certain quantity in a set of reference areas. The data layer is a raster layer, the reference layer must be a polygonal one

wps:Process.ows:Title: Clips the features to the specified bounding box
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Clips the features to the specified bounding box

wps:Process.ows:Title: Reprojects the specified features to another CRS, can also be used to force a known CRS onto a set of feaures that miss one (or that have a wrong one)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Reprojects the specified features to another CRS, can also be used to force a known CRS onto a set of feaures that miss one (or that have a wrong one)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Reprojects the specified geometry from the source CRS to the target one)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Reprojects the specified geometry from the source CRS to the target one)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Applies a generic scale and translate operation to a coverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Applies a generic scale and translate operation to a coverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: Simplifies the geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Simplifies the geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Snap to the nearest feature
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Snap to the nearest feature

wps:Process.ows:Title: Applies a raster symbolizer to the coverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Applies a raster symbolizer to the coverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: Applies a raster symbolizer to the coverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Applies a raster symbolizer to the coverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the unique values of a certain attribute
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the unique values of a certain attribute

wps:Process.ows:Title: Provides statistics for the distribution of a certain quantity in a set of reference areas. The data layer must be a point layer, the reference layer must be a polygonal one
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Provides statistics for the distribution of a certain quantity in a set of reference areas. The data layer must be a point layer, the reference layer must be a polygonal one

wps:Process.ows:Title: Buffer Features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Buffer each Feature in a Feature Collection

wps:Process.ows:Title: DoubleAddition
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Adds two double precision floating point numbers and returns the sum as a double

wps:Process.ows:Title: Intersection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Intersection between two literal geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Vectorize raster regions
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Raster region to vector polygon conversion

wps:Process.ows:Title: Union
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Union 2 or more geometries together

wps:Process.ows:Title: Rasterize features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Rasterize all or selected features in a FeatureCollection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Buffer
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Buffer a geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Aspect
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Derives aspect from a gridcoverage surface. The aspect identifies the downslope direction of the maximum rate of change in value from each cell to its neighbors.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Clip
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Extracts the cells of a raster based on a clip geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Conditional Evaluation
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Performs a conditional if/else evaluation on each of the input cells of an input raster.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Contour
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a line features of contours (isolines) from a raster surface.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Contour List
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a line features of selected contour values from a raster surface.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Coverage To Features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Converts a gridcoverage to features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Curvature
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates the curvature of a raster surface, optionally including profile and plan curvature.

wps:Process.ows:Title: CutFill
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates the volume change between two surfaces. This is typically used for cut and fill operations.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Density
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates the density of input features within a neighborhood around each output raster cell.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Describe
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Describes GridCoverage's metadata

wps:Process.ows:Title: Euclidean Allocation
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates, for each cell, the nearest source based on Euclidean distance. Example of usage: What is the closest town?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Euclidean Direction
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates, for each cell, the direction, in degrees, to the nearest source. Example of usage: What is the direction to the closest town?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Euclidean Distance
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates, for each cell, the direction, in degrees, to the nearest source. Example of usage: What is the distance to the closest town?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Extract Values To Points
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Extracts the cell values of a raster based on a set of point features and records the values in the attribute table of an output feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Extraction
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Extracts the cells of a gridcoverage based on a filter encoding

wps:Process.ows:Title: Features To Coverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Converts features to a gridcoverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: Flip
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Reorients the raster by turning it over, from top to bottom, along the horizontal axis through the center of the raster.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Flow Direction
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a raster of flow direction from each cell to its steepest downslope neighbor.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Focal Statistics
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates a statistic on a raster over a specified neighborhood

wps:Process.ows:Title: Fuzzy
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transforms the input raster into a 0 to 1 scale, indicating the strength of a membership in a set, based on a specified fuzzification algorithm.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geometry To Coverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Converts features to a gridcoverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: GetMap
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: A CA_GetMap request retrieves a map from inputCoverage and sld

wps:Process.ows:Title: HillShade
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a shaded relief from a surface gridcoverage by considering the illumination source angle and shadows.

wps:Process.ows:Title: IDW
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Interpolates a surface from points using an inverse distance weighted (IDW) technique.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Kernel Density
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates a magnitude per unit area from point or polyline features using a kernel function to fit a smoothly tapered surface to each point or polyline.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Line Density
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates a magnitude per unit area from polyline features that fall within a radius around each cell.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Line Of Sight
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Determines the visibility of sight lines over a surface defined by a raster dem

wps:Process.ows:Title: Math
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates mathematical operations on gridcoverage(s).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Merge
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Mosaics multiple raster datasets into a new raster dataset.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Mirror
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Reorients the raster by flipping it, from left to right, along the vertical axis through the center of the raster.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Point Density
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates a magnitude per unit area from point features that fall within a neighborhood around each cell.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Profile
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a polyline featurecollection with z values interpolated from the input gridcoverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: Reclass
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Reclassifies the values of the input cells of a inputCoverage using ranges

wps:Process.ows:Title: Reclass Statistics
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 급간(reclassifyRanges)별로 면적, 갯수, 최소값, 최대값, 평균, 분산, 표준편차를 계산하여 XML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Resample
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Alters the gridcoverage by changing the cell size and resampling method.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Rescale
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Resizes a raster by the specified x and y scale factors.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Rotate
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Turns the raster dataset around the specified pivot point by angle specified in degrees; the raster dataset will rotate in a clockwise direction.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Roughness
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Derives Roughness from a gridcoverage surface.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SetMask
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Extracts the cells of a raster based on a maskCoverage.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Shift
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Moves (slides) the raster to a new geographic location, based on x and y shift values

wps:Process.ows:Title: Slope
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Identifies the slope (gradient, or rate of maximum change in z-value) from each cell of a gridcoverage surface.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Surface Value
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a polyline featurecollection with z values interpolated from the input coverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: Topographic Position Index
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Derives Topographic Position Index (TPI) from a gridcoverage surface.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Terrain Ruggedness Index
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Derives Terrain Ruggedness Index (TRI) from a gridcoverage surface.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Thin Plate Spline Process
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Interpolates a surface from points using a thin plate spline (TPS) algorithm.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Zonal Statistics
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates statistics on values of a gridcoverage within the zones of another dataset.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Accessibility
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 사용자가 설정한 영역 내 모든 필지를 대상으로 주요도로 및 지하철역과의 접근성 분석 후 XML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Arithmetic GrowthModel
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 단순증가선형모형(등차급수법) 인구가 선형으로 증감하는 도시에 적용하며, 안정된 인구증가율을 유지하며 급격한 변동이 없는 기존도시(지방도시)의 인구추정에 주로 이용한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Building Ratio By Adjacent Road
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 사용자가 설정한 영역 내 주택접도율 계산 후 XML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate CutFill
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 수치고도모델(DEM) 자료를 이용하여 개발후보지의 절토량과 성토량의 최적값을 산출

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Supply Pop
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 해당시설의 서비스 반경을 설정하여 시설 규모에 비례하고 거리에 반비례하는 허프(Huff)모형 기반의 분석 프로세스를 통해 추정하고 공급적정성평가를 위해 사전 수행되는 분석이다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: CreateMDADataset
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 국토지표현황 데이터베이스로부터 시계열 다차원 DB를 생성 후 GML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: DefaultStateView
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 분석이 필요한 시설 및 지역을 선택하여 기반 시설에 대한 기초현황을 조회한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: DemandCommercialArea
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 상업용지 소요면적 산정 산업시설 및 단지건설이 요구되는 산업용지의 규모 예측 중 상업용지 소요면적을 산정한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: DemandDistribution
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 수요분석: 현재의 인구정보로부터 시설별 이용가능 잠재수요를 추정 후 추정된 수요의 공간적 분포도를 생성하여 표 및 지도로 표시한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: DemandHousing
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 주택호수 소요면적 산정 신규 주택건설이 요구되는 주거용지의 규모 예측 중 주택호수에 의한 소요면적을 산정한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: DemandIndustrialArea
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 공업용지 소요면적 산정 산업시설 및 단지건설이 요구되는 산업용지의 규모 예측 중 공업용지 소요면적을 산정한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: DemandLivingDensity
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 거주밀도 소요면적 산정 새로운 주택건설이 요구되는 주거용지의 규모 예측 중 거주밀도에 의한 소요면적을 산정한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Density
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 도시재정비계획지원모형에 활용되는 노후불량률, 호수밀도, 과소필지율, 도로점유율을 분석 후 GridCoverage로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: DistanceMatrix
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 입지배분 후보지 접근성 분석: 신규시설과 5대 시설군에 대한 접근성을 직선거리 또는 네트워크 거리를 계산해 분석

wps:Process.ows:Title: ExponentialGrowthModel
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 순간복리형지수모형(지수함수법) 연도의 경과에 따라 보다 급격한 인구증가를 나타내는 경우 주로 이용한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: FindNearestFeatures
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 분석결과 후보지 또는 사용자 입력지점에서 검색대상 레이어와의 가장 가까운 피쳐 및 최단경로(직선거리 또는 네트워크 거리)를 분석.

wps:Process.ows:Title: GeometricGrowthModel
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 등비급수형지수모형(등비급수법) 인구증가가 급속하게 이루어지는 신공업도시나 광산도시의 인구추정에 주로 이용한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: InfrastructureAnalizeLass
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 입지배분 후보지 탐색: 시설의 공급적정성 평가에 의해 해당시설이 부족하다고 판단된 지역을 대상으로 신규 시설의 최적의 입지를 입지배분방법에 따라 탐색한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: LFI
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 형상지수[LFI = (2 * Sqrt(PI * 면적)) / 둘레길이]: 토지형상의 복잡성을 계량화하는 지표로써, 값이 높을수록 부지의 형상이 개발가능지로써 적합하다고 해석할 수 있다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: LogisticGrowthModel
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 로지스틱모형 인구성장이 초기에는 완만하다가 일정기간이 지나면 급속한 증가율을 나타내고 또 일정기간이 지나면 그 증가율이 점차 감소하여 결국에는 인구가 일정수준을 유지하는 인구성장 경로를 분석하는데 적합한 모델이다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: ParcelBoundary
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 후보지 경계를 지적의 필지 경계로 변환

wps:Process.ows:Title: RegionalStatistics_Building
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 분석대상 시도/시군구의 시군구별/읍면동별 노후불량건축물 현황 데이터 셋 생성 후 GML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: RegionalStatistics_Parcel
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 분석대상 시도/시군구의 시군구별/읍면동별 과소필지 현황 데이터 셋 생성 후 GML로 반환한다

wps:Process.ows:Title: RoadLengthRatioByWidth
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 사용자가 설정한 영역 내 도로점유율을 계산 후 XML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SimulateCalculateDemandPop
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 인구증가가 예상되는 지역경계를 설정하고 예상 증가량을 입력 후 계획 공급량을 재계산한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SimulateCalculateSupplyPop
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 시설이 추가로 필요한 지역을 대상으로 시설의 위치와 규모를 입력 후 실제 공급량을 재계산한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SimulateDecrepitFeatures
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 사용자가 설정한 영역 내 노후불량 건축물을 조회하여 GML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SimulateDecrepitRatio
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 사용자가 설정한 영역 내 노후불량 건축물을 조회하여 XML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SummaryReport_Building
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 사용자가 설정한 영역 내 포함된 건축물의 건축물조서를 작성하여 XML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SummaryReport_Parcel
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 사용자가 설정한 영역 내 포함된 필지의 토지조서를 작성하여 XML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SupplyFitMeasure
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 공급적정성 평가지수(필요공급량 – 실제공급량)를 구성하여 지도로 표현하고 행정단위별로 시설 추가소요량 및 과다공급량을 계산하여 공급적정성평가 정보를 표로 집계한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: AHP
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) is a structured technique for organizing and analyzing complex decisions.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Area
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates area values for each feature in a polygon feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Distance Band
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the minimum, the maximum, and the average distance to the specified Nth nearest neighbor (N is an input parameter) for a set of features

wps:Process.ows:Title: Central Feature
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Identifies the most centrally located feature in a point, line, or polygon feature class. ex)Which feature is most accessible?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Classify Features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Classify objects apply one of several methods to statistically subdivide a set of numeric values into classes.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Classify GridCoverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Classify objects apply one of several methods to statistically subdivide a set of numeric values into classes.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Collect Events
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Collect Event combines coincident points. It converts event data, such as crime or disease incidents, to weighted point data.

wps:Process.ows:Title: G-Statistics Global
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Measures the degree of clustering for either high values or low values using the Getis-Ord General G statistic.

wps:Process.ows:Title: G-Statistics Local
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Given a set of weighted features, identifies statistically significant hot spots and cold spots using the Getis-Ord Gi* statistic.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Histogram Features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: FeatureCollection의 특정필드 값을 Value-Frequency 쌍으로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Histogram GridCoverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: GridCoverage의 셀값을 Value-Frequency 쌍으로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: K-Means Cluster
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: k-means clustering is a method of cluster analysis which aims to partition n observations into k clusters in which each observation belongs to the cluster with the nearest mean

wps:Process.ows:Title: Linear Directional Mean
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Identifies the mean direction, length, and geographic center for a set of lines. ex)What is the dominant direction or orientation?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Mean Center
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Identifies the geographic center (or the center of concentration) for a set of features. ex)Where is the center?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Mean Center Series
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Identifies the geographic center (or the center of concentration) for a set of features. ex)Where is the center?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Median Center
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Identifies the location that minimizes overall Euclidean distance to the features in a dataset.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Morans I Global
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Measures spatial autocorrelation based on feature locations and attribute values using the Global Moran's I statistic.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Morans I Local
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Given a set of weighted features, identifies statistically significant hot spots, cold spots, and spatial outliers using the Anselin Local Moran's I statistic.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Nearest Neighbor Index
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates a nearest neighbor index based on the average distance from each feature to its nearest neighboring feature.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Pearson
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Pearson's correlation is obtained by dividing the covariance of the two variables by the product of their standard deviations

wps:Process.ows:Title: Regression
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: In statistics, regression analysis includes many techniques for modeling and analyzing several variables, when the focus is on the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Spatial ChiSquare Global
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Measures spatial cluster based on feature locations and attribute values using the Global Spatial Chi-Square statistic.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Spatial ChiSquare Local
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Measures spatial cluster based on feature locations and attribute values using the Global Spatial Chi-Square statistic.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Spatial Cross Analysis
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 두 지표의 값들을 x, y 평면좌표에 점으로 나타내어 두 지표간 관계를 보는 것으로 각 지표들 값을 ‘낮음’과 ‘높음’으로 양분한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Spatial LQ
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 공간입지계수.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Standard Deviational Ellipse
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates standard deviational ellipses to summarize the spatial characteristics of geographic features: central tendency, dispersion, and directional trends. ex)Are there directional trends?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Standard Distance
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Measures the degree to which features are concentrated or dispersed around the geometric mean center. ex)How dispersed, compact, or integrated are features?

wps:Process.ows:Title: Statistics Ex
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates summary statistics for field(s) in a featurecollection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Statistics Features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates summary statistics(Sum, Minimum, Maximum, Mean, Standard Deviation etc.) for field(s) in a featurecollection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Statistics GridCoverage
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates summary statistics(Sum, Minimum, Maximum, Mean, Standard Deviation etc.) for cell values in a gridcoverage

wps:Process.ows:Title: Computes the geometry area (in a cartesian plane, using the same unit of measure as the geometry coordinates, don't use with geometries expressed in geographic coordinates)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes the geometry area (in a cartesian plane, using the same unit of measure as the geometry coordinates, don't use with geometries expressed in geographic coordinates)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns inputGeometry as Well-Known Binary(WKB) format
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns inputGeometry as Well-Known Binary(WKB) format

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns inputGeometry as GML format
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns inputGeometry as GML format

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns inputGeometry as GeoJSON format
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns inputGeometry as GeoJSON format

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns inputGeometry as GeoRSS format
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns inputGeometry as GeoRSS format

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns inputGeometry as KML format
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns inputGeometry as KML format

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns inputGeometry as SVG format
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns inputGeometry as SVG format

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns inputGeometry as WKT format
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns inputGeometry as WKT format

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the closure of the combinatorial boundary of this Geometry.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the closure of the combinatorial boundary of this Geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Computes a buffer area around this geometry having the given width.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes a buffer area around this geometry having the given width.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a geometry's centroid
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a geometry's centroid

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 contains g2
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 contains g2

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the convex hull of the specified geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the convex hull of the specified geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns coordinate dimension of the geometry as a small int. Values are: 2,3 or 4.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns coordinate dimension of the geometry as a small int. Values are: 2,3 or 4.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries cross each other
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries cross each other

wps:Process.ows:Title: Return a Delaunay triangulation around the given input points.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return a Delaunay triangulation around the given input points.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Densifies the geometry using the specified distance
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Densifies the geometry using the specified distance

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the difference between g1 and g2
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the difference between g1 and g2

wps:Process.ows:Title: The inherent dimension of this Geometry object, which must be less than or equal to the coordinate dimension.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The inherent dimension of this Geometry object, which must be less than or equal to the coordinate dimension.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries have no points in common
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries have no points in common

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the minimum distance between two geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the minimum distance between two geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the last point of a LINESTRING geometry as a POINT or NULL if the input parameter is not a LINESTRING.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the last point of a LINESTRING geometry as a POINT or NULL if the input parameter is not a LINESTRING.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a geometry representing the double precision bounding box of the supplied geometry.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a geometry representing the double precision bounding box of the supplied geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries are exactly the same
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries are exactly the same

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a line string representing the exterior ring of the POLYGON geometry. Return NULL if the geometry is not a polygon. Will not work with MULTIPOLYGON
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a line string representing the exterior ring of the POLYGON geometry. Return NULL if the geometry is not a polygon. Will not work with MULTIPOLYGON

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the Point on the line at the given distance or ratio.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the Point on the line at the given distance or ratio.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the Point on the line at the given distance or ratio.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the Point on the line at the given distance or ratio.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a version of the given geometry with X and Y axis flipped. Useful for people who have built latitude/longitude features and need to fix them.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a version of the given geometry with X and Y axis flipped. Useful for people who have built latitude/longitude features and need to fix them.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the 1-based Nth geometry if the geometry is a GEOMETRYCOLLECTION, (MULTI)POINT, (MULTI)LINESTRING, (MULTI)POLYGON.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the 1-based Nth geometry if the geometry is a GEOMETRYCOLLECTION, (MULTI)POINT, (MULTI)LINESTRING, (MULTI)POLYGON.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the type of the geometry as a string. EG: 'Linestring', 'Polygon','MultiPolygon' etc.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the type of the geometry as a string. EG: 'Linestring', 'Polygon','MultiPolygon' etc.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the hausdorff distance between two geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the hausdorff distance between two geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the Nth interior linestring ring of the polygon geometry. Return NULL if the geometry is not a polygon or the given N is out of range. index starts at 1.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the Nth interior linestring ring of the polygon geometry. Return NULL if the geometry is not a polygon or the given N is out of range. index starts at 1.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the intersectoin between g1 and g2 (eventually an empty collection if there is no intersection)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the intersectoin between g1 and g2 (eventually an empty collection if there is no intersection)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries intersect
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries intersect

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE if the LINESTRING's start and end points are coincident.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE if the LINESTRING's start and end points are coincident.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE if the argument is a collection (MULTI*, GEOMETRYCOLLECTION, ...)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE if the argument is a collection (MULTI*, GEOMETRYCOLLECTION, ...)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if this Geometry is an empty geometrycollection, polygon, point etc.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this Geometry is an empty geometrycollection, polygon, point etc.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE if this LINESTRING is both closed and simple.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE if this LINESTRING is both closed and simple.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns (TRUE) if this Geometry has no anomalous geometric points, such as self intersection or self tangency.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns (TRUE) if this Geometry has no anomalous geometric points, such as self intersection or self tangency.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns true if the ST_Geometry is well formed.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if the ST_Geometry is well formed.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Computes the geometry lfi. Land Form Index(LFI) = (2 * Sqrt(PI * Area)) / Length
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes the geometry lfi. Land Form Index(LFI) = (2 * Sqrt(PI * Area)) / Length

wps:Process.ows:Title: Computes the geometry perimeters, computed using cartesian geometry expressions in the same unit of measure as the geometry (will not return a valid perimeter for geometries expressed geographic coordinates
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes the geometry perimeters, computed using cartesian geometry expressions in the same unit of measure as the geometry (will not return a valid perimeter for geometries expressed geographic coordinates

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the manhattan distance between two geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the manhattan distance between two geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the smallest circle polygon that can fully contain a geometry. Default uses 48 segments per quarter circle.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the smallest circle polygon that can fully contain a geometry. Default uses 48 segments per quarter circle.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the nearest point between two geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the nearest point between two geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: If geometry is a GEOMETRYCOLLECTION (or MULTI*) return the number of geometries, for single geometries will return 1, otherwise return NULL.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: If geometry is a GEOMETRYCOLLECTION (or MULTI*) return the number of geometries, for single geometries will return 1, otherwise return NULL.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the number of interior rings of the first polygon in the geometry. Synonym to ST_NumInteriorRings.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the number of interior rings of the first polygon in the geometry. Synonym to ST_NumInteriorRings.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the number of interior rings of the first polygon in the geometry. This will work with both POLYGON and MULTIPOLYGON types but only looks at the first polygon. Return NULL if there is no polygon in the geometry.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the number of interior rings of the first polygon in the geometry. This will work with both POLYGON and MULTIPOLYGON types but only looks at the first polygon. Return NULL if there is no polygon in the geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the number of points in an ST_LineString or ST_CircularString value.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the number of points in an ST_LineString or ST_CircularString value.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 overlaps with g2
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 overlaps with g2

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the Nth point in the first linestring or circular linestring in the geometry. Return NULL if there is no linestring in the geometry.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the Nth point in the first linestring or circular linestring in the geometry. Return NULL if there is no linestring in the geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 overlaps with g2
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 overlaps with g2

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the polygon's exterior rings
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the polygon's exterior rings

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the geometry with vertex order reversed.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the geometry with vertex order reversed.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Rotate a geometry rotRadians counter-clockwise about an origin.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Rotate a geometry rotRadians counter-clockwise about an origin.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Scales the geometry to a new size by multiplying the ordinates with the parameters.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Scales the geometry to a new size by multiplying the ordinates with the parameters.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Set spatial reference using the specified srid
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Set spatial reference using the specified srid

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the 2-dimensional shortest line between two geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the 2-dimensional shortest line between two geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Simplifies the geometry using the specified distance using the Douglas-Peuker algorithm
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Simplifies the geometry using the specified distance using the Douglas-Peuker algorithm

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a collection of geometries resulting by splitting a geometry.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a collection of geometries resulting by splitting a geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the first point of a LINESTRING geometry as a POINT or NULL if the input parameter is not a LINESTRING.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the first point of a LINESTRING geometry as a POINT or NULL if the input parameter is not a LINESTRING.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns a geometry made of points that are in g1 or g2, but not in both
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns a geometry made of points that are in g1 or g2, but not in both

wps:Process.ows:Title: Return a Thiessen Polygons from the given input points.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return a Thiessen Polygons from the given input points.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries touch each other
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if the two geometries touch each other

wps:Process.ows:Title: Transform the geometry using the specified srid
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transform the geometry using the specified srid

wps:Process.ows:Title: Translates the geometry to a new location using the numeric parameters as offsets.
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Translates the geometry to a new location using the numeric parameters as offsets.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns the geometric union of two geometries
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the geometric union of two geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 is within g2
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns TRUE(1) if g1 is within g2

wps:Process.ows:Title: Buffer
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates buffer polygons around input features to a specified distance. An optional dissolve can be performed to combine overlapping buffers.

wps:Process.ows:Title: CadDataset To GML
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Converts a cad(dxf) file to GML featurecollection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Area
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Adds the fields GEOM_AREA to the input features and calculates feature's area.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Field
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates the values of a field for a feature class based on a specified expression.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Fuzzy
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transforms the input raster into a 0 to 1 scale, indicating the strength of a membership in a set, based on a specified fuzzification algorithm.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Length
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Adds the fields GEOM_LEN to the input features and calculates feature's length.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Linear Transform
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transforms the input raster into a 0 to 1 scale, indicating the strength of a membership in a set, based on a linear transformation algorithm.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Shortest Distance
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Calculates shortest distance for each feature in two feature collections.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Sum Length
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 폴리곤과 Intersection하는 라인의 총 길이를 특정 필드에 계산. ex) 시군별로 철도 또는 고속도로의 연장을 계산

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate XY Coordinate
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Adds the fields COORD_X and COORD_Y to the input features and calculates their values.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Clip
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Extracts those features or portions of features from an input feature class that overlap with a clip feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Define Projection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Overwrites the coordinate system information stored with a dataset.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Create Delaunay Triangulation
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates Delaunay Triangulation polygons from point input features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Densify
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Inserts vertices along line or polygon features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Describe
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Describes feature's metadata

wps:Process.ows:Title: Dissolve
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Aggregates features based on specified attributes.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Erase
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This tool creates a feature class from those features or portions of features outside the erase feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Feature Envelope To Polygon
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a feature collection containing polygons, each of which represents the envelope of an input feature.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Feature Vertices To Points
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a feature class containing points generated from specified vertices or locations of the input features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Features To Point
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a feature class containing points generated from the representative locations of input features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Features To Shapefile
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Convert GML featurecollection to a zip compressed shapefile

wps:Process.ows:Title: Create Fishnet
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Column, Row 또는 가로크기, 세로크기 입력을 통해 Fishnet 폴리곤(rectangular cells) Feature 생성 후 GML로 반환

wps:Process.ows:Title: Flip Line
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Reverses the from-to direction of line features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Generalize
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Simplifies the input features using the Douglas-Peucker simplification algorithm with a specified maximum offset tolerance. The output features will contain a subset of the original input vertices.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Calculate Area
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Sums geometry's area for each feature in a polygon feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: GetMap
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: A VA_GetMap request retrieves a map from inputFeatures and sld

wps:Process.ows:Title: Hexagon
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates hexagon grids from extent

wps:Process.ows:Title: Identity
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This tool combines the portions of features that overlap the identity features to create a new feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Intersect
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This tool builds a new feature class from the intersecting features common in both feature classes.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Merge
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Combines multiple input datasets of the same data type into a single, new output dataset.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Minimum Bounding Geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a feature class containing polygons which represent a specified minimum bounding geometry enclosing each input feature or each group of input features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Multipart To Singlepart
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a feature collection containing singlepart features generated by separating multipart input features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Multiple Ring Buffer
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates multiple buffers at specified distances around the input features. the linear unit of the input features' spatial reference is used

wps:Process.ows:Title: Point Distance
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Determines the distances from input point features to all points in the near features within a specified search radius.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Point Statistics
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: 폴리곤 FeatureCollection의 각 Feature에 포함되는 포인트 Feature의 속성정보를 요약해서 GML로 반환한다.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Points To Line
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates line features from points.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Polar Grids From Features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a radial polar grids from point features

wps:Process.ows:Title: Polar Grids From Geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a radial polar grids from geometry(centroid)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Polygonize
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a feature collection containing polygons generated from areas enclosed by input line

wps:Process.ows:Title: Project
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Projects spatial data from one coordinate system to another.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Remove Holes
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Remove the polygon's interior rings

wps:Process.ows:Title: Repair Geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Inspects each feature in a feature class for geometry problems

wps:Process.ows:Title: Select
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Extracts selected features from an input feature class based on an attribute query and stores them in the output feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Shapefile To GML
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Converts shapefile to GML feature collection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Spider Diagram By Attributes
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a line features representing the shortest distance between center and destination features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Spider Diagram By Features
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a line features representing the shortest distance between center and destination features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Split Line At Vertices
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates a feature class containing lines that are generated by splitting input lines or polygon boundaries at their vertices.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Swap XY Coordinates
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Swap XY coordinates of features in a point, line, polygon features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Symmetrical Difference
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This tool creates a feature class from those features or portions of features that are not common to any of the other inputs.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Create Thiessen Polygon
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Creates Thiessen polygons from point input features.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Trim Line
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Removes portions of a line that extend a specified distance past a line intersection (dangles).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Union
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This tool builds a new feature class by combining the features and attributes of each feature class.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Union Geometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Unions features's geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Update
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes a geometric intersection of the Input Features and Update Features. Update = (a NOT b) + b
